de989166-5c9e-40d6-b4f4-69d6256616cc: A Hellknight signifer gains proficiency with heavy armor.
c0b135bc-9faf-4c1c-93d0-4c840fd89050: At 10th level, while wearing his signifer mask, a Hellknight signifer is immune to blindness, gazes and vision-based effects and gains a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on all {g|Encyclopedia:Persuasion}Persuasion{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g}.
4dc077b0-9c29-4698-b4b3-5e82f2305559: At 2nd level, if a Hellknight signifer has the Arcane Armor Training {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}, he gains Arcane Armor Mastery as a bonus feat.
0b07a429-b630-4b92-afc7-0456172b5c24:
At 3rd level, while a Hellknight signifer wears armor, he reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Check_Penalty}armor check penalty{/g} by 1 (to a minimum of 0), and reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Fail_Chance}arcane spell failure chance{/g} by 5%.
At 8th level, he reduces his armor check {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} by an additional 1, and reduces his arcane {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} failure by an additional 5%.
Additionally, a Hellknight signifer's {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} is not reduced by wearing medium or heavy armor.
bb8118d5-856d-4d69-a821-dd39716d81da:
At 4th level a Hellknight signifer gains the assiduous gaze ability. He can use it for the number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} equal to his {g|Encyclopedia:Class_Level}class level{/g} once per day. He gains the benefits of True Seeing for the duration.
At 7th level, a Hellknight signifer can use this ability two times per day.
60d92eec-b702-47eb-ac4d-698eb7e3d48c: At 6th level, a Hellknight signifer gains a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} of Illusion school.
a81750d7-3159-493c-96ab-279c52e39d38: At 9th level, a Hellknight signifer gains {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} 5/chaotic and becomes immune to poison.
f1672a86-ab95-40fd-999a-68d0ffb390f0: Hellknight signifers form the spellcasting arm of the Hellknight orders. They serve as faceless enforcers of order and use their magical powers to relentlessly root out and punish criminals to the letter of the law. They wear masks — often featureless — to mark themselves as impersonal agents of order, unswayed by empathy, detached from emotion, and dedicated to passing impartial judgment upon all lawbreakers. A signifer's distinctive mask is a symbol of his devotion to the precepts of law and exacting justice, and it serves as the focus for several of his signifer powers. Traditionally, signifers are arcane or divine spellcasters.
6d2a7291-fb77-44eb-829d-a77e7f5ce86d: Upon initiation, a Hellknight signifer receives a signifer mask, often devoid of eyeholes or other personal features. This mask doesn't obscure the signifer's vision, and while wearing it he gains a +2 competence {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Perception}Perception checks{/g} and on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} and abilities that rely on visual effects.
